claim: The poverty threshold may be adjusted only every four years.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Despite the name , it is not universal , and only the people under the poverty threshold may receive it .

claim: The poverty threshold may be adjusted only every four years.
premise_source_doc_sentence: In any given year roughly one out of every five  (  20 %  )  households falls below the poverty line at some point while up to 40 % may fall into poverty within the course of a decade .

claim: The poverty threshold may be adjusted only every four years.

claim: The poverty threshold may be adjusted only every four years.
premise_source_doc_sentence: The poverty threshold is used by federal organizations , including the United States Census Bureau , but government aid programs do not have to use the threshold as a standard to determine eligibility .
